footer.footerText: Our platform combines shopping and social networking for an innovative and seamless shopping experience. Explore, interact, and buy

about.aboutText: We are committed to providing a distinguished experience that combines comfort and social interaction

download.downloadTitle: Turn every click into a new discovery!
download.downloadDesc: Join now a different shopping world, where every click becomes an opportunity to discover new products and services. Start your journey today!

firstSection.title: Shop and share in one place Discover, buy, and communicate
firstSection.desc: Our application combines shopping and social networking, allowing you to discover products and buy them, while communicating and sharing your moments with others

advantages.mainDesc: Many advantages to discover with Peers
advantages.titleOne: Integrated shopping experience with social networks
advantages.descriptionOne: Browse and buy products and services directly from your favorite social networks
advantages.descriptionTwo: Get recommendations for products and services that suit your interests and personal preferences
advantages.descriptionThree: Share shopping experiences and ratings with others and shop with them in an interactive and fun way
advantages.titleFour: Customer service available at all times
advantages.descriptionFour: 24/7 customer support to ensure a smooth and hassle-free shopping experience
advantages.descriptionFive: The various and secure payment options provided by the application make the purchasing process easy and secure

fqa.fqaDesc: Answers to the most common questions about using the application

contactUs.contactDesc: We are here to help you in case you encounter any problem or have any inquiry
